name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. SMITHKLINE BECKMAN CORPORATION

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
FLAHERTY, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Suellen M. Wolfe, Harrisburg, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
498 A.2d 374
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. SMITHKLINE BECKMAN CORPORATION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 18, 1985.
Decided Oct. 3, 1985.
Suellen M. Wolfe, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Robert R. Batt, Bonnie S. Brier, James A. Lebovitz, Ballard, Spahr, Andrews & Ingersoll, Philadelphia, for appellee.
